Low Level Connector¶

Low level connector to the API.

Api Connector¶

Low level connector module.

class pymultimatic.api.connector.Connector(user: str, password: str, session: aiohttp.client.ClientSession, smartphone_id: str = 'pymultiMATIC')¶

This is the low level smart.vaillant.com API connector.

This is returning the raw JSON from responses or an ApiError if something goes wrong (basically, when response error code is 4xx or 5xx).

On the first call, the connector will login automatically (if login() was not called previously).

On following calls, the connector will re-use the cookie received from the API. If the connector receives an HTTP 401, it will clear the cookie and try to re-login before raising an ~pymultimatic.api.error.ApiError. This also means the connector is able to reconnect automatically when cookie is outdated.

Please use urls in order to generate URL to be passed to the connector.64:36

Parameters

  • user (str) – User to login with.

  • password (str) – Password associated with the user.

  • session – (aiohttp.ClientSession): Session.

  • smartphone_id (str) – This is required by the API to login.

async delete(url: str, payload: Optional[Dict[str, Any]] = None) → Any¶

Do a delete against vaillant API.

async get(url: str, payload: Optional[Dict[str, Any]] = None) → Any¶

Do a get against vaillant API.

async is_logged() → bool¶

Check if the connector is already logged in.

It relies in the presence of cookies.

async login(force: bool = False) → bool¶

Log in to the API.

By default, the connector will try to re-use cookies

Parameters

force (bool) – If set to True, the connector will clear the cookie (if any) and start a new authentication, otherwise it will re-use the existing cookie.

Returns

True/False if authentication succeeded or not.

Return type

bool

async logout() → bool¶

Get logged out of the API.

It first sends a logout request to the API (it means cookies are invalidated), then cookies will be cleared, regardless of the result of the logout request.

The connector will have to request a new token and ask for cookies if a new request is done.

Raises

ApiError – When something went wrong with the API call.

async post(url: str, payload: Optional[Dict[str, Any]] = None) → Any¶

Do a post against vaillant API.

async put(url: str, payload: Optional[Dict[str, Any]] = None) → Any¶

Do a put against vaillant API.

async request(method: str, url: str, payload: Optional[Dict[str, Any]] = None) → Any¶

Do a request against vaillant API.

Urls¶

Vaillant API Urls for multimatic app.

pymultimatic.api.urls.authenticate(**kwargs: Any) → str¶

Url to authenticate the user and receive cookies.

pymultimatic.api.urls.base(**kwargs: Any) → str¶

Base url of the API.

pymultimatic.api.urls.circulation(**kwargs: Any) → str¶

Url to get Circulation details.

pymultimatic.api.urls.circulation_configuration(**kwargs: Any) → str¶

Url to handle Circulation configuration.

pymultimatic.api.urls.circulation_timeprogram(**kwargs: Any) → str¶

Url to handle Circulation TimeProgram.

pymultimatic.api.urls.delete_repeater(**kwargs: Any) → str¶

Url to delete a repeater.

pymultimatic.api.urls.dhw(**kwargs: Any) → str¶

Url to get domestic hot water (HotWater and Circulation).

pymultimatic.api.urls.emf_report(**kwargs: Any) → str¶

Url to get emf (Embedded Metering Function) report.

pymultimatic.api.urls.emf_report_device(energy_type: str, function: str, time_range: str, start: str, offset: str, **kwargs: Any) → str¶

Url to get emf (Embedded Metering Function) report for a specific device.

pymultimatic.api.urls.facilities_default_settings(**kwargs: Any) → str¶

Url to get facility default settings

pymultimatic.api.urls.facilities_details(**kwargs: Any) → str¶

Url to get facility detail.

pymultimatic.api.urls.facilities_installer_info(**kwargs: Any) → str¶

Url to get facility default settings.

pymultimatic.api.urls.facilities_list(**kwargs: Any) → str¶

Url to get the list of serial numbers of the facilities (and some other properties).

Note

For now, the connector only handle one serial number.

pymultimatic.api.urls.facilities_settings(**kwargs: Any) → str¶

Url to get facility settings.

pymultimatic.api.urls.facilities_status(**kwargs: Any) → str¶

Url to get facility status.

pymultimatic.api.urls.gateway_type(**kwargs: Any) → str¶

Url to get the gateway type (VR900, VR920, etc.).

pymultimatic.api.urls.hot_water(**kwargs: Any) → str¶

Url to get HotWater detail.

pymultimatic.api.urls.hot_water_configuration(**kwargs: Any) → str¶

Url to handle HotWater configuration.

pymultimatic.api.urls.hot_water_operating_mode(**kwargs: Any) → str¶

Url to set HotWater operating mode, only if it’s not a quick action.

pymultimatic.api.urls.hot_water_temperature_setpoint(**kwargs: Any) → str¶

Url to set HotWater temperature setpoint.

pymultimatic.api.urls.hot_water_timeprogram(**kwargs: Any) → str¶

Url to handle HotWater TimeProgram.

pymultimatic.api.urls.hvac(**kwargs: Any) → str¶

Url of the hvac overview.

pymultimatic.api.urls.hvac_update(**kwargs: Any) → str¶

Url to request an hvac update.

pymultimatic.api.urls.live_report(**kwargs: Any) → str¶

Url to get live report data (current boiler water temperature, current hot water temperature, etc.).

pymultimatic.api.urls.live_report_device(**kwargs: Any) → str¶

Url to get live report for specific device

pymultimatic.api.urls.logout(**kwargs: Any) → str¶

Url to logout from the API, cookies are invalidated.

pymultimatic.api.urls.new_token(**kwargs: Any) → str¶

Url to request a new token.

pymultimatic.api.urls.photovoltaics(**kwargs: Any) → str¶

Url to get photovoltaics data.

pymultimatic.api.urls.rbr_installation_status(**kwargs: Any) → str¶

Url to check the room by room installation status.

pymultimatic.api.urls.rbr_underfloor_heating_status(**kwargs: Any) → str¶

Url to check if underfloor heating is installed or not.

pymultimatic.api.urls.repeater_name(**kwargs: Any) → str¶

Url to set repeater’s name.

pymultimatic.api.urls.repeaters(**kwargs: Any) → str¶

Url to get list of repeaters

pymultimatic.api.urls.room(**kwargs: Any) → str¶

Url to get specific room details (configuration, timeprogram). Or to delete a Room.

pymultimatic.api.urls.room_child_lock(**kwargs: Any) → str¶

Url to handle child lock for all Device in a Room.

pymultimatic.api.urls.room_configuration(**kwargs: Any) → str¶

Url to get configuration for a Room (name, temperature, target temperature, etc.).

Set Device name.

pymultimatic.api.urls.room_operating_mode(**kwargs: Any) → str¶

Url to set operating for a Room.

pymultimatic.api.urls.room_quick_veto(**kwargs: Any) → str¶

Url to handle QuickVeto for a Room.

pymultimatic.api.urls.room_temperature_setpoint(**kwargs: Any) → str¶

Url to handle target temperature for a Room.

pymultimatic.api.urls.room_timeprogram(**kwargs: Any) → str¶

Url to get/update configuration for a class:~pymultimatic.model.component.Room. (name, temperature, target temperature, etc.).

pymultimatic.api.urls.rooms(**kwargs: Any) → str¶

Url to get the list of Room.

Payloads¶

Groups all API payloads. Payload are always json formatted.

pymultimatic.api.payloads.holiday_mode(active: bool, start_date: datetime.date, end_date: datetime.date, temperature: float) → Dict[str, Any]¶

Payload to set HolidayMode.

pymultimatic.api.payloads.hot_water_operating_mode(mode: str) → Dict[str, Any]¶

Payload to set operating mode for HotWater.

pymultimatic.api.payloads.hotwater_temperature_setpoint(temperature: float) → Dict[str, Any]¶

Payload used to set target temperature for HotWater.

pymultimatic.api.payloads.quickmode(quick_mode: str, duration: Optional[int] = None) → Dict[str, Any]¶

Payload to set QuickMode for the system.

Duration is mandatory (Duration is in minutes, max 1440 =24 hours).

pymultimatic.api.payloads.room_operating_mode(mode: str) → Dict[str, Any]¶

Payload to set operating mode for Room.

pymultimatic.api.payloads.room_quick_veto(temperature: float, duration: Optional[int]) → Dict[str, Any]¶

Payload to set a QuickVeto for a Room.

Duration is mandatory (Duration is in minutes, max 1440 =24 hours).

pymultimatic.api.payloads.room_temperature_setpoint(temperature: float) → Dict[str, Any]¶

Payload used to set target temperature for Room.

pymultimatic.api.payloads.ventilation_operating_mode(mode: str) → Dict[str, Any]¶

Payload to set operating mode for Ventilation.

pymultimatic.api.payloads.zone_operating_mode(mode: str) → Dict[str, Any]¶

Payload to set operating mode for Zone.

pymultimatic.api.payloads.zone_quick_veto(temperature: float) → Dict[str, Any]¶

Payload to set a QuickVeto for a Zone.

The duration is not configurable by the API, it’s 6 hours

pymultimatic.api.payloads.zone_temperature_setback(temperature: float) → Dict[str, Any]¶

Payload used to set setback temperature for Zone.

pymultimatic.api.payloads.zone_temperature_setpoint(temperature: float) → Dict[str, Any]¶

Payload used to set target temperature for Zone.

Api Error¶

Errors coming from the API.

exception pymultimatic.api.error.ApiError(message: str, response: Optional[aiohttp.client_reqrep.ClientResponse], payload: Any = None)¶

This exception is thrown when a communication error occurs with the vaillant API.

Defaults¶

contains some default parameters of the application.

pymultimatic.api.defaults.MULTIMATIC = 'SYSTEMCONTROL_MULTIMATIC'¶

Applications

pymultimatic.api.defaults.SMARTPHONE_ID = 'pymultiMATIC'¶

Default smartphone id.
